fields.name: Day 6:
fields.value:
The mountains are not the only thing moving, as today everything I've placed down has ended up in another location. I tried many ways to see what was moving my items, but it seemed to always know when I was watching. A hidden camera caught the objects moving and... the objects moved on their own. It's possible that an invisible creature moved it, so I'll send the fottage to the lab to be analyzed. However, I have a feeling something much more powerful moved the objects...
Attack: None
Defense: None

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Attacks against you secretly fail, but if the target you are possessing would be attacked, you are attacked as well.
- Immunity to roleblocks and redirects.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If this is part of the Daily Streak Faction, the Spirits factional rule of weakening every day still applies, but won't become worse than Night 5.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eradicate the living who you seek revenge of.
